extension.name: S5 Photo Showcase
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: This is a responsive module that will showcase images, along with optional html or text, in a sliding fashion. The layout of the photographs gives a sneak peek of the images to the left and right of the active image.

field.name: moduleclass_sfx
field.label: Module Class Suffix
field.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module provided by the template. This allows individual module styling

field.name: s5_width
field.label: Active Image Width
field.description: This is the width of the center image when the screen size is smaller than the max width chosen below. For example if your max width is 1000px but your screen width is only 800px wide this percentage width will be used.

field.name: s5_max_width
field.label: Max Width
field.description: Above you will set the width of the center image, but this setting will not allow the center image to get any larger than the value you enter here. A recommended number would be between 800 and 1100, enter only numbers.

field.name: s5_display_time
field.label: Display Time
field.description: How long should each slide appear for before transitioning to the next one?

field.name: s5_content_type
field.label: Text or HTML
field.description: In the fields below you can enter either just plain text to appear over individual images, and the module will add some default styling to it, or you can enter your own custom HTML markup with no styling provided by the module (settings under the Styling section of this module). If you don't want anything over the images simply leave the fields below blank and nothing will show on top of them. Using your own HTML markup will disable the title fields below, simply enter all of your HTML markup into the text fields below.
field.option: HTML - I Will Provide The Styling
